item.description:
It is too darn cold to walk outside so let's walk around the Peabody Essex Museum! I moved to Salem area recently and thought this would make a great meet up. I will be in the lobby at 3:15 and we will wait until 3:30. The museum is open until 5:30pm (feel free to get there earlier if you would like to have more time).

If people are up for it, we can grab a bite to eat around the East Indian mall area as there is something for everyone.

T accessible via commuter rail. Parking local in East Indian mall or garage.

Admission:

Adults $15, Seniors $13, Students $11
Youth (16 and under) and Salem, Mass. residents admitted free*.
*Does not apply to youth in student/tour groups

Local libraries also have museum passes that will admit you for $5-8 dollars.

For more information: http://www.pem.org/exhibitions/
item.name: Peabody Essex Museum
